synopsis.text: As the J-Rock band CLIMB disbands, drummer Santa and guitarist Yuki seize the opportunity to form their own band, Lucifer. The duo faces the daunting task of recruiting new members and managing personal struggles while attempting to make a name in the music industry. After a chance encounter with a captivating piano player and singer, they find the perfect vocalist in the enigmatic Sakuya, who carries a dark past and a depressed demeanor. Along with bassist Towa and young guitarist Atsuro, Lucifer is formed, but staying together proves challenging as they watch their former bands rise to success. The band must confront personal issues, such as parental disapproval and Sakuya's tragic history with teenage lyricist Aine, all while trying to find their path in life and keep their band from falling apart. Will Lucifer rise above the challenges, or will their personal demons hold them back?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
